betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now that I have encountered the Avatar of the Meatball Man, in all of its power, I thought I understood what type of might his full form may hold, but after this I am not sure anymore.
Yes, the traces left by the rebellious undead was meant to be found, and it was meant to be followed. It was a call for help, one I answered too late, unfortunately.
Some undead were holding on to a power, a holy light, something that could put the Meatball Man back into his original role. Whatever this 'holiness' may be, I cannot even begin to guess, but the point of its importance remains.
The Meatball Man came in full force to stop it, and I was too late. 
The Undead had already been under his control, and they retaliated against me. Something in their being, though, still retained some of this essence, this 'holiness'.
Also, I think I may have witnessed, at least partially, what the true form of the Meatball Man, or maybe his power, may be. A mass of meatball flesh, expanding, growing, enveloping everything in its path.
In its behavior, this reminds of taint. A force powerful enough to annhilate full planets.
If the Meatball Man really wanted to, I suspect the same could happen to Terra...
